entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
